item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.862 released
item.description: Changelog:[Fix] Added missing xsl files in FTOutput folder.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.867 released
item.description: Changelog:Changelog: [Fix] Updated to support results viewing in IE10. [Fix] Updated output format to show optimisation output in a consistent style to the other analysis results. [Fix] Updated output to allow going back to the list of optimisation results from a specific candidate.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.868 released
item.description: Changelog:Changelog:[Fix] Updated to ensure IE11 compatibility.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.869 released
item.description: Changelog:[Fix] Updated to ensure IE 11 compatibility

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.870 released
item.description: Changelog:[Fix] Excessive numbers of warnings no longer cause an out of memory crash. Warning numbers capped at 100 whilst still recording the total number of errors. [Fix] Incorrect parser error causing crash.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.871 released
item.description: Changelog:[Fix] Bug in Matlab Failure Editor that allowed component data to be overwritten with other component data. [Fix] Bug in Matlab Failure Editor that occurred when users switched from a perspective to a component.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.872 released
item.description: Changelog:[Fix] HiP-HOPS now gracefully handles running out of memory rather than crashing.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.873 released
item.description: Changelog:Updated ASIL parameters to include number of output solutions and a cost heuristic.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.874 released
item.description: Changelog:Updated to ensure backwards compatibility with Windows XP.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.876 released
item.description: Changelog:[Fix] Corrected Minor Asil decompostion usability issue.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.877 released
item.description: Changelog:

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.878 released
item.description:
Changelog:Updated the PCCF handling in the output so that they stay visible. This way it is possible to see which components are connecting to a given common cause failure.
Also: [Fix] Corrected a fault with lines that transform failure classes.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.879 released
item.description: Changelog:Added experimental ASIL decomposition utility.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.881 released
item.description: Changelog:

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.882 released
item.description: Changelog:Fixed bug to do with cut set pruning. Should yield improved performance in certain fault trees.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.883 released
item.description: Changelog:Updated Matlab2Hipx to allow Matlab libraries to be analysed.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.885 released
item.description: Changelog:Fixed missing generations field in Matlab Failure Editor GUI

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.887 released
item.description: Changelog:Fixed a bug in the Matlab GUI script where ports were not being properly exported to the HiP-HOPS xml model file.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.888 released
item.description: Changelog:Fixed a bug which was causing a crash under certain circumstances when the command argument idevns=false was used.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.889 released
item.description: Changelog:Fixed a number of sources of memory leaks.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.890 released
item.description: Changelog:Fixed a number of sources of memory leaks.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.891 released
item.description: Changelog:[Fix] Issues with applying the consensus law in non-coherent fault trees.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.892 released
item.description: Changelog:

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.893 released
item.description: Changelog:[fix] Bug in the Matlab GUI scripts that caused an error if the top subsystem in the model had the same name as the model. [fix] Bug in the HiP-HOPS engine that prevented the user from targeting a system level implicit output deviation when the explicit deviation is in a subsystem. [fix] The xml output from the Matlab GUI script now includes line breaks after tags to make the line numbers in the HiP-HOPS parse errors more meaningful.

item.title: HiP-HOPS Version 2.5.899 released
item.description: Changelog:[feature] updated unavailability calculations [feature] added frequency calculation [fix] Matlab interface bug the prevented editing of exiting failure logic [fix] Matlab interface bug preventing output to XML
